languages.text: {n}Сон разрывает чье-то резкое движение и глухой выстрел. Открыв глаза, вы видите рядом Соломона — он подался вперед, одна рука стискивает оружие под дымящейся подушкой. Его бешеный взгляд устремлен во мрак покоев, зубы оскалены. Арбитр дышит, словно загнанный зверь.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
я бы стартовал диалог так — сначала темно, затем громкий звук выстрела, и уже после этого куя показываем картинку
Соломон и РТ лежат в постели

я бы стартовал диалог так — сначала темно, затем громкий звук выстрела, и уже после этого куя показываем картинку
Соломон и РТ лежат в постели

languages.text: {n}The dream is shattered by someone's sharp movement and the muffled sound of a gunshot. You open your eyes to see Solomorne at your side. He is leaning forward, one hand clutching his weapon behind a smoking pillow. His frenzied eyes are trained on the darkness of your chambers, his teeth bared. He is panting like a hunted animal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сон разрывает чье-то резкое движение и глухой выстрел. Открыв глаза, вы видите рядом Соломона — он подался вперед, одна рука стискивает оружие под дымящейся подушкой. Его бешеный взгляд устремлен во мрак покоев, зубы оскалены. Арбитр дышит, словно загнанный зверь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un coup de feu étouffé et un mouvement brusque interrompent soudainement votre rêve. Lorsque vous ouvrez les yeux, vous découvrez à côté de vous Solomorne, penché en avant. Sa main est crispée sur son arme, toutes deux dissimulées par un oreiller fumant. Avec une grimace menaçante, il balaie la pièce obscure d'un regard frénétique en haletant comme une bête traquée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dream is shattered by someone's sharp movement and the muffled sound of a gunshot. You open your eyes to see Solomorne at your side. He is leaning forward, one hand clutching his weapon behind a smoking pillow. His frenzied eyes are trained on the darkness of your chambers, his teeth bared. He is panting like a hunted animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un coup de feu étouffé et un mouvement brusque interrompent soudainement votre rêve. Lorsque vous ouvrez les yeux, vous découvrez à côté de vous Solomorne, penché en avant. Sa main est crispée sur son arme, toutes deux dissimulées par un oreiller fumant. Avec une grimace menaçante, il balaie la pièce obscure d'un regard frénétique en haletant comme une bête traquée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}銃声が鳴り響き、夢から引き戻された。目を開けると、ソロモーンが煙を上げるピストルを手にして立っていた。狂気じみた目をあなたの部屋の闇に向け、歯をむき出しにしている。彼は、まるで狩られる獣のように荒い息をついていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dream is shattered by the sound of a gunshot. You open your eyes to see Solomorne holding a smoking pistol. His frenzied eyes are trained on the darkness of your chambers, his teeth bared. He is panting like a hunted animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}銃声が鳴り響き、夢から引き戻された。目を開けると、ソロモーンが煙を上げるピストルを手にして立っていた。狂気じみた目をあなたの部屋の闇に向け、歯をむき出しにしている。彼は、まるで狩られる獣のように荒い息をついていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un movimiento brusco y el sonido amortiguado de un disparo interrumpen tu sueño. Abres los ojos y ves a Solomorne a tu lado. Está inclinado hacia delante, y tiene su arma en la mano, pegada a una humeante almohada. Sus ojos, frenéticos, se clavan en las sombras de tus aposentos y enseña los dientes, jadeando como un animal atrapado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dream is shattered by someone's sharp movement and the muffled sound of a gunshot. You open your eyes to see Solomorne at your side. He is leaning forward, one hand clutching his weapon behind a smoking pillow. His frenzied eyes are trained on the darkness of your chambers, his teeth bared. He is panting like a hunted animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un movimiento brusco y el sonido amortiguado de un disparo interrumpen tu sueño. Abres los ojos y ves a Solomorne a tu lado. Está inclinado hacia delante, y tiene su arma en la mano, pegada a una humeante almohada. Sus ojos, frenéticos, se clavan en las sombras de tus aposentos y enseña los dientes, jadeando como un animal atrapado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你从睡梦中惊醒，听到某个人剧烈的动作声，之后是手枪发出的一声闷响。你睁开眼睛，看到索罗蒙在你身边。他身体前倾，一只手紧紧握着手枪。枪口前的枕头被烧了个洞，正冒着黑烟。他眼神狂乱，死死地盯着黑暗的房间，龇着牙齿，喘着粗气，仿佛遭到狩猎的野兽一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dream is shattered by someone's sharp movement and the muffled sound of a gunshot. You open your eyes to see Solomorne at your side. He is leaning forward, one hand clutching his weapon behind a smoking pillow. His frenzied eyes are trained on the darkness of your chambers, his teeth bared. He is panting like a hunted animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你从睡梦中惊醒，听到某个人剧烈的动作声，之后是手枪发出的一声闷响。你睁开眼睛，看到索罗蒙在你身边。他身体前倾，一只手紧紧握着手枪。枪口前的枕头被烧了个洞，正冒着黑烟。他眼神狂乱，死死地盯着黑暗的房间，龇着牙齿，喘着粗气，仿佛遭到狩猎的野兽一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rüya, keskin bir hareketle ve boğuk bir silah sesiyle paramparça oluyor. Gözlerini açtığında yanında Solomorne'u görüyorsun. Öne eğilmiş, bir eliyle dumanı tüten yastığın ardındaki silahını sımsıkı kavramış hâlde duruyor. Öfkeden deliye dönen gözleri odanın karanlığına alışmış, dişleri kenetlenmiş. Solomorne, avcısından kaçan bir hayvan gibi soluk soluğa kalmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dream is shattered by someone's sharp movement and the muffled sound of a gunshot. You open your eyes to see Solomorne at your side. He is leaning forward, one hand clutching his weapon behind a smoking pillow. His frenzied eyes are trained on the darkness of your chambers, his teeth bared. He is panting like a hunted animal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Rüya, keskin bir hareketle ve boğuk bir silah sesiyle paramparça oluyor. Gözlerini açtığında yanında Solomorne'u görüyorsun. Öne eğilmiş, bir eliyle dumanı tüten yastığın ardındaki silahını sımsıkı kavramış hâlde duruyor. Öfkeden deliye dönen gözleri odanın karanlığına alışmış, dişleri kenetlenmiş. Solomorne, avcısından kaçan bir hayvan gibi soluk soluğa kalmış.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Traum wird durch die plötzliche Bewegung einer Person und das gedämpfte Geräusch eines Schusses unterbrochen. Als du die Augen öffnest, steht Solomorne neben dir. Er beugt sich vor und verdeckt mit einem rauchenden Kissen seine Waffe. Seine gehetzten Augen sind die Dunkelheit deiner Gemächer gewöhnt. Er keucht mit entblößten Zähnen wie ein gejagtes Tier.{/n}

He is leaning forward, one hand clutching his weapon behind a smoking pillow. His frenzied eyes are trained on the darkness of your chambers, his teeth bared. He is panting like a hunted animal.{/n}
